data.title: Flex-mix
data.description: Flex-mix has all needed functionality for building web application from scratch. It is my own solution for front-end development. It`s sass based boilerplate with grid system that based on flex technology. Sass structure is based on 7-1 architecture pattern(https://github.com/HugoGiraudel/sass-boilerplate). Responsive grid is based on Flexbox Grid(http://flexboxgrid.com/). Automation tools: Gulp. Other libraries: jQuery 2.2.3, Wow.js, modernizr.
data.responsibilities: Whole project creation. GitHub repository, documents, whole development
data.techs: JavaScript, HTML5, SASS, Flex, Gulp, NPM, Bower

data.title: Zszywka
data.description: Zszywka is a graphic social network, where you can find an inspiring image on any topic, meet new people, promote own products. Zszywka allows to store all images one place, create shared publics and share an inspiration with other users.
data.responsibilities: Development of administration panel tools for viewing statistics reports, complaints from users and content editing for the graphical social network Zszywka.pl. Creation of functionality "promo post", which allows users to keep their posted content in the top of related category. Creation of public (shared group). This is a group that allows creators to add administrators and send invitation for many other members. Also users can send invitation to each other and share their content. Implementation of new graphical components in Zszywka.pl design (buttons, labels, fonts, logos, etc.).
data.techs: PHP5, MySQL, Smarty, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery
